title: [Large-scale] Learning Design Utilizing Math Educational Video Subtitles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematics Concepts and Secondary-Level Science Knowledge
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedules and guaranteed smartphone-based accessibility for working adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately understand at least 80% of specialized terminology and complex explanations using math video subtitles
Learners can effectively link visual explanations and audio narration through subtitles at least 70% of the time
Learners can self-directively review difficult math concepts at least 90% of the time using the pause/repeat functions of subtitles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
